name: ReferralMD
tag_list: emr, electronic-medical-records, ehr, saas, software, healthcare, medical-software
overview:
The First Social Referral Network for Healthcare

2-Way Referral Communication ReferralMD streamlines the patient-referral process so you can access, manage and share digital referral letters online including attachments. Stay up to date with your patient’s treatment pre- & post- appointment.

Accurate Referral Reporting With ReferralMD you will always know the who, what, when, and whyâ€™s when it comes to referrals sent and received. Real-time reports provide you with valuable information to run your organization.

HIPAA Compliant Security ReferralMD improves the safety of referral transmission by connecting organizations in a private cloud environment. 99.9% up-time guarantee, data encryption using 256-bit SSL and SAS 70 II Certification.
